
The :abbr:`QC (quality control)` measures included in mriqc
===========================================================

Structural :abbr:`MRI (magnetic resonance imaging)` images
==========================================================


:abbr:`fMRI (functional MRI)` images
====================================


:abbr:`dMRI (diffusion MRI)` images
===================================

mriqc does not include measures for :abbr:`dMRI (diffusion MRI)` yet.
